item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2015/06/2004-bmw-m3/#comment-434325">Danny (ae86)</a>.
For the convenience and that I thought it paired well with the E46. But ultimately, I didn't like it. Needs to be manual all the way.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Danny (ae86).

For the convenience and that I thought it paired well with the E46. But ultimately, I didn’t like it. Needs to be manual all the way.
